title: Mind Body Connection | Chiropractor in Rapid City, MI | Torch Chiropractic Family Wellness Center
description: Mind Body Connection in Rapid City, MI. Torch Chiropractic Family Wellness Center is your local Chiropractor in Rapid City serving all of your needs. Call us today at 231-331-7010 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Whether we're driving a car, riding a bike, or trying to record a spare at our local bowling alley, our musculoskeletal system bases its decision-making on past history, that is, what it has learned before.
